title: IELTS Online Regular Course
description: The IELTS course puts equal weight on reading writing, listening, speaking and test taking strategies. The course also covers sub skills such as academic vocabulary, academic style and study skills each day. ... If the student places at Level 4 they are eligible for IELTS.

title: IELTS With Foundation (Online)
description: This course is designed for intermediate English students who are aiming for an IELTS score of 6.0 or higher to help gain access to university or college, or to improve employment prospects - in Australia, or in other English-speaking countries throughout the world.
